plot: Raimonds, a 12 year old boy, falls into a world of petty crime while trying to stay out of trouble with his mother.
title: Mammu, es Tevi milu
plot_es: Raimonds, a 12 year old boy, falls into a world of petty crime while trying to stay out of trouble with his mother.
